Skyfall Content Pack

Take on the role of James Bond as played by Daniel Craig in all new Skyfall levels. Unlock three new single player levels following the storyline of the Skyfall movie. Levels take place in Istanbul and Shanghai as Bond attempts to track down the villain Patrice. This update will become automatically available as an update to 007 Legends.
